name: Crimson Imprint plus -Nonexistent Christmas-
description: This is a story about her and him. This is also a story about meeting and parting. Perhaps it is a very simple story. It may be a very complicated story. A simple FAREWELL ...... And not a grand farewell. If you can feel the joy and sorrow we pour in, it is a great encouragement to us.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: AMD Athlon x2 250 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 3450 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: AMD R5 1500X Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon RX 480 Storage: 10 GB available space
